name: Tan-Tan-Tanuki
storyline: You play as a kid who is transformed into a Tanuki and is transported to the Yokai Realm. To get back home, you must seek out the Tanuki elders and thwart the Kitsune's trickery along the way, in order for the elders to change you back and send you home. As you journey through the caverns in search for said elders, you will encounter various Yokai that may help or hinder you on your quest.
summary: Tan-Tan-Tanuki is a 2d platformer that I made to make it fun to learn about Yokai and to introduce people to the world of Yokai and Japanese folklore.
